data.meta_description: Microsoft released Service Pack 2 for Microsoft Windows Server 2003 today. If you don't know what I'm on about, than please read one of my previous posts. Windows Server 2003 Service Pack 2 delivers on Microsoft's Trustworthy Computing initiative and illustrates Microsoft's commitment to continually create software products with enhanced security, increased reliability, and simplified administration. data.meta_site_name: The things that are better left unspoken
data.text:
Reading Time: 2 minutes

Microsoft released Service Pack 2 for Microsoft Windows Server 2003 today. If you don't know what I'm on about, than please read one of my previous posts. Windows Server 2003 Service Pack 2 delivers on Microsoft's Trustworthy Computing initiative and illustrates Microsoft's commitment to continually create software products with enhanced security, increased reliability, and simplified administration. Windows Server 2003 Service Pack 2 builds upon the impressive track record of the award-winning Windows Server 2003 operating system by introducing numerous refinements in addition to supplying cumulative system updates. Deploying Service Pack 2 will help enterprises across all industries and segments enhance security, increase reliability, and simplify administration through guided attack surface reduction.

Applies to

SP2 update applies to:

Windows Server 2003 All Editions (32-bit x86)

Windows Server 2003 Itanium-based Editions

Windows Server 2003 x64 Editions

Windows Server 2003 R2 Editions

Windows Server 2003 Storage Server R2 Edition

Windows Server 2003 Compute Cluster Edition

Windows Server 2003 for Small Business Servers R2 Edition

Windows XP Professional x64 Edition

More information

You'd be wise to read the following stuff before deploying Windows Server 2003 Service Pack 2:

Windows Server 2003 & Windows XP x64 Service Pack 2 Overview

Windows Server 2003 & Windows XP x64 Service Pack 2 Data Sheet

Top 10 Reasons to Install Windows Server 2003 SP2

Windows Server 2003 SP2 Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

Windows Server Division Web log

List of updates in ServicePack 2
